H0.text: In which city can you visit the Luigi Ferraris Stadium, the gardens of the Villa Durazzo-Pallavicini, the Piazza De Ferrari, the cemetery of Staglieno, the Edoardo Chiossone Museum of Oriental Art and the Torre della Lanterna. Milan

A6.text: The Stadio Luigi Ferraris is located in Genoa, Italy.
